item.title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' clears key Senate hurdle after high drama
item.description: The vote came after hours of uncertainty over whether the massive package could secure enough Republican votes to move to a final Senate vote.

item.title: Elon Musk rips into 'utterly insane' Trump-backed megabill
item.description: Elon Musk, the richest man in the world, has been a critic of President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful bill," after serving as his biggest financial b...

item.title: What's in the Senate’s version of Trump's spending bill — and who stands to benefit
item.description: One major sticking point for Republican fiscal hawks is the megabill's proposed $5 trillion debt ceiling increase.

item.title: Trump loses latest bid to get Central Park Five defamation lawsuit tossed
item.description: It is the latest blow to President Donald Trump's efforts to dismiss the defamation case filed against him.

item.title: GOP Rep. Don Bacon to retire, Omaha swing district now a top target for Dems
item.description: House Republican Don Bacon of Nebraska is expected to announce that he will not run for reelection.
